item.title: Ansible
item.description: Install requirements ansible-galaxy collection install --requirements-file requirements.yaml ansible-galaxy roles install --requirements-file requirements.yaml Ping All Nodes ansible all -m ping A group of Nodes ansible <group name> -m ping Run A Playbook ansible-playbook <path to playbook>.yml Playbook with SOPS encrypted secrets SOPS_AGE_KEY_FILE=<path to age key file> ansible-playbook <path to playbook>.yml Secrets Create a Secret age-keygen > <path to age key file> Sample # created: 2022-02-11T09:41:54+05:30 # public key: age1pqa839xsu7rgdmghchjgexue7fpa985fskpdqr4yq84xc4r0zuysk855k9 AGE-SECRET-KEY-17KP5RAUU7PE00X2CGLXJ63DSZLTC4E3YP6L7CQT0M72PS60QDN6QU4RVK6 Create/View a sops encrypted file SOPS_AGE_KEY_FILE=<path to age key file> sops --age <public age key> <path to secrets>.
